sentences.english: The breaking surf on the reef is mesmerizing.
sentences.chinese: 拍打在礁石上浪涛声催人入梦。

sentences.english: The waves dashed against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 浪涛猛烈地冲击着岩石。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, the wave will come along and knock down what we have worked so hard to build up.
sentences.chinese: 浪涛迟早会袭来摧毁我们辛勤劳动所建造起来的一切。

sentences.english: The Views from the Master Bedroom a goodd Guest room overlook the surf a goodd Maunwoulsua Bay.
sentences.chinese: 主卧室和客房的景观俯瞰毛纳鲁尔湾的浪涛。

sentences.english: Watch the surf from the Triple Twin Room that looks out over Maunaloa Bay.
sentences.chinese: 从俯瞰毛纳路尔湾的三倍双人房观看浪涛。

sentences.english: I could not see the land, only mountains of water all around me.
sentences.chinese: 我没法看见陆地，我的四周只有排山倒海的浪涛。

sentences.english: Waves on the mississippi swamped boats and washed others upon the shore .
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河的浪涛将船只击沉并将其它东西冲至岸上。

sentences.english: The stopping surf on the reef is mesmerizing.
sentences.chinese: 拍打在礁石上浪涛声催人入梦。

sentences.english: They were aware only of this effect upon the color of the waves that rolled toward them.
sentences.chinese: 他们只是从滚滚而来的浪涛的颜色上察觉到这番变化。

sentences.english: This is the unsounded purple sea of marching billows.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个浪涛滚滚的不安宁的华美的大海。

sentences.english: The wind were swooping down to tease the waves.
sentences.chinese: 大风猛扑到海面上戏弄着浪涛。

sentences.english: The waves were depositing a fringe of soiled yellow foam along the waterline .
sentences.chinese: 浪涛在海岸线旁沉积成土黄色的泡沫。

sentences.english: However, rain and wave end , but sorrows don't.
sentences.chinese: 然而，雨水和浪涛会止息，哀伤却不会。

sentences.english: I should like to find a final resting place within sound of its surf.
sentences.chinese: 我乐意寻找，最后的归依，伴随著浪涛漾岸的声音。

sentences.english: The Views from the Master Bedroom and Guest room overlook the surf and Maunalua Bay.
sentences.chinese: 主卧室和客房的景观俯瞰毛纳鲁尔湾的浪涛。

sentences.english: The seagull fly off, the waves roll away and we apart.
sentences.chinese: 海鸥飞走了，浪涛滚滚向前，而我们也该做别离。

definition: to beat against the shore (of waves)
spray/ocean spray/spindrift/fig. happenings from one's life/CL:朵[duo3]
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
